Name: Burger Joint
About the game: Burger Joint is a strategy game where you you must balance the sale of your burgers, and joints. You begin with a small space and some petty cash to make some legal... and illegal, investments. Expand your restaurant by obtaining more space, serving new food items, and upgrading your layout. Build an intimidating crime empire by hiring a gang, selling contraband, and pulling off robberies. Beware, police will always be on patrol, and the FDA and cartel will be waiting for the right time to strike. Your goal as a manager is to finally reach your retirement, so your operation must survive six months without being raided. The success of your restaurant will build reputation, keeping the suspicions of the FDA low The success of your criminal enterprise will build fierceness, keeping the cartel away Build your business and earn your retirement!
